Title: Relates to establishing minimum standards for payment plans for eligible customers
Summary: Relates to establishing minimum standards for payment plans for eligible customers; requires the public service commission to set standards for payment plans for certain customers including reasonableness of agreements and timelines for payment; establishes eligibility.
LawCode: Add ยง66-t, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to establishing minimum standards for payment plans for eligible customers
